description: Try our easy to follow Lime & Chili Thai Salmon Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Christmas,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Tomato,Easter leftovers,Dairy free,Salmon
name: Lime & Chili Thai Salmon Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: Lebanese cucumber, cut lengthways, seeds scraped out and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl combine 1/4 cup lime and chilli vinaigrette with brown sugar and stir until dissolved. Add salmon fillets, coat with marinade and leave for 15 minutes.
While salmon marinates, prepare the salad ingredients except the sliced chilli and chopped peanuts. Toss the salad with the remaining lime and chili vinaigrette.
Heat a large frypan over high heat and gently lay the salmon fillets in leaving to sear on each side for 3 minutes. Remove from the heat and rest for 2 minutes.
Portion the salad into 4 bowls and top with salmon fillet and garnish with sliced red chilli and chopped peanuts.
